author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Discovery ‍Says HY Normalised Profit From Operations Up 19%
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Discovery Ltd:
* ‍HY NORMALISED PROFIT FROM OPERATIONS UP 19% TO R4 059 MILLION​
* HY NORMALISED HEADLINE EARNINGS INCREASED BY 30% TO R2 829 MILLION​
* ‍HY DILUTED HEPS 425.8 CENTS PER SHARE​ * ‍DECLARED INTERIM GROSS CASH DIVIDEND OF 518.15068 CENTS PER B PREFERENCE SHARE FOR PERIOD 1 JULY 2017 TO 31 DECEMBER 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
